Bash(# Count methods in Admin.php (excluding constructor)
echo ""Admin.php methods (excluding constructor):""
grep -c ""public function"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Admin.php
grep ""public function"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Admin.php | grep -v ""__construct"" | wc -l

echo -e ""\nStaff.php methods:""
grep -c ""public function"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php

echo -e ""\nStaff.php methods that contain admin functionality:""
grep ""public function"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php | grep -E ""(test|debug|dashboard|grades|divisions|students|academic_years|parents|staff|fee_|announcement|complaint|report|role|permission|wallet|profile|system_|assign_)"" | wc -l)

Bash(# Check if key admin methods are now in Staff.php
echo ""Key admin methods now in Staff.php:""
grep ""public function"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php | grep -E ""(test|dashboard|grades|students|academic_years|parents|staff|fee_categories|fee_structures|announcements|complaints|reports|roles|permissions|system_settings)"" | head -10)

Bash(# Check file structure and line count
echo ""Staff.php line count:""
wc -l /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php

echo -e ""\nSyntax check (PHP lint):""
php -l /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php)

Bash(# Find methods that exist in both original Staff.php and Admin.php
echo ""Original Staff.php methods:""
grep ""public function"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php | head -16

echo -e ""\nChecking for method conflicts with admin methods...""
grep ""public function"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Admin.php | grep -v ""__construct"" | while read line; do
    method_name=$(echo ""$line"" | sed ''s/.*public function \([^(]*\).*/\1/'')
    if grep -q ""public function $method_name"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php | head -720; then
        echo ""CONFLICT: $method_name""
    fi
done)

Bash(# First, let''s restore the original Staff.php by removing everything after line 729
head -729 /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php > /tmp/staff_original.php
mv /tmp/staff_original.php /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php

# Verify the restoration
tail -5 /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php)

Bash(# Remove the closing brace again
sed -i '''' ''$d'' /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php

# Add admin methods separator comment
cat << ''EOF'' >> /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php

    // ==================== ADMIN METHODS TRANSFERRED FROM ADMIN.PHP ====================
    // Note: All admin methods are prefixed with ''admin_'' to avoid conflicts with existing staff methods
    
EOF

# Extract admin methods and add them with admin_ prefix
sed -n ''44,$p'' /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Admin.php | \
sed ''s/public function \([^(]*\)/public function admin_\1/g'' >> \
/Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php)

Bash(# Check the end of the file
tail -10 /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php

echo -e ""\nCheck syntax:""
/Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/bin/php -l /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php)

Bash(# Check some admin methods are now prefixed
echo ""Sample admin methods now in Staff.php with prefix:""
grep ""public function admin_"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php | head -10

echo -e ""\nTotal admin methods added:""
grep -c ""public function admin_"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php

echo -e ""\nTotal methods in Staff.php now:""
grep -c ""public function"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php)

Bash(# Check final file statistics
echo ""Final Staff.php statistics:""
wc -l /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php

echo -e ""\nVerify file structure looks good:""
grep -E ""^class Staff|^public function|^}"" /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles/htdocs/School/backend/application/controllers/api/Staff.php | tail -5)
